entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as holding his wand a little higher and sliding from the boulder into the sea.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as seeing a fissure in the cliff and following Dumbledore into the water.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object that Harry wears to become invisible. It is mentioned that there is no need for it now.

relationships.description: Dumbledore and Harry are swimming together towards the dark slit in the rock face. Dumbledore slides from the boulder into the sea and begins to swim, with a perfect breaststroke, while Harry follows him.
